job.title: Software Engineer Mobile
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Financial Services,Investment Banking
job.description: Our CONFIDENTIAL, growth client is hiring a Senior Mobile Engineer who has a strong aptitude for identifying opportunities to improve user experience, robust experience translating design into code, and a proactive desire to collaborate with fellow developers, designers, and product managers to build amazing apps. Position is full-time and reports to the Manager of Mobile Engineering. Responsibilities: Collaborate with product managers, designers, and backend engineers to design and deliver high-quality products on iOS and Android. Build efficient and reusable UI components and architect reliable, performant, and maintainable solutions. Work alongside a team of talented engineers to continuously build, ship, learn, and iterate on our products. Mentor and help develop a high-performing team of engineers. Qualifications: You have at least 2+ years of experience building mobile applications You have used React Native to build cross-platform mobile applications You are comfortable working with JavaScript/Typescript, but also not afraid to jump into Swift or Kotlin as needed You have knowledge of mobile best practices and stay informed about innovations in the mobile industry You have a strong understanding of UX/UI concepts and a demonstrated record of design sensibility Preferred Qualifications: Experience working with Bitcoin, Ethereum, and/or blockchain technology a huge plus Experience working with Fastlane and/or build automation tooling Once you apply, we’ll send you all company information and a highlight of their leadership team.
